titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Frank J. Novak Photographs of printers' marks, 1460-1599

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Novak, Frank J., collector. Photographs of printers' marks,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

did.abstract: Collection contains photographs and photocopies of the printer's marks of various famous European printers.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Frank J. Novak Photographs of printers' marks. M1005. Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content Summary
scopecontent.p: Collection contains photographs and photocopies of the printer's marks of various famous European printers.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Book industries and trade--Heraldry.
Devices (Heraldry)
Printers' marks.
Printers' ornaments.
Printing.

did.unittitle: A typewritten list of printer's marks taken from Paul Heitz's multivolume catalog "Die Buchermarken oder Buchdrucker und Verlegerzeichen" , Strassburg, Volume 2 as used to identify the card-mounted enlarged photographs in the collection.1895

Xerox copies of selected pages from "Printer's and Publisher's Devices in England & Scotland" by Ronald B. Mckerrow, London 1913;& "Bibliographie des Editions de Simon de Colines 1520-1546," par Ph. Renouard, Nieuwkoop, 1962; "Catalogue D'Une Collection Unique de Volumes imprime Les Elzevier",Redige Par Edouard Rahir Nieuwkoop, 1965;"Robert Estienne Royal Printer" , by Elizabeth Armstrong, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1954; "A History of the Cambridge University Press", 1521-1921, by S.C. Roberts, M.A. Cambridge Univ. Press, 1921 "Jakob Kobel Zu Oppenheim,1494-1533;Von Josef Benzing, Wiesbaden 1962; "Christopher Plantin", by Colin Clair, Cassell & Co. Ltd. London, ND
A Xerox copy of selected pages from "Basler Buchermarken" by Paul Heitz, Strassburg, 1895

Xerox copies of "Frankfurter und Mainzer Drucker und Lerlegerzeichen " ,by Paul Heitz, vol. 4.1896. "Spanische und Portugiesische Bucherzeichen' By Konrad Haebler , Strassburg, 1898; "Kolner Buchermarken", by Paul Heitz, Strassburg, 1898
Xerox copies of the "Genfer Buchdrucker und Verlegerzeichen" par Paul Heitz ;Vol. 7, Strassburgh, 1908
Printer; John Siberich - De Octo Partium Orationis Constructione Libellus by Lily & Erasmus Printer: Robert Estienne -Mark used by Estienne as the "King's Printer in Greek"
Printer Jakob Kobel zu Oppenheim [1494-1533]-Astrolabii Declaratio Eiusdemque Usus...Parisiis apud G. Richardum ; 1545 Octavo 32 Bl. Sign;A-D8 Paris.-Bib. Nat'l.
Printer; Christopher Plantin {this mark is the combined marks of Christopher Plantin, Jan Steels, &. Philip Nuyts as Joint Publ. Decretales Gregorii 1x [1573]
Christopher Plantin by Colin Clair; Mark of the Vine used by Plantin until 1557
Printer; Jean Crespin; De Aeterna Dei Praedestinatione-1552
Printer; Die Familie Estienne [Stephanus]-La Bible[Robert Estienne-1553] Jon Calvin, Commentarius in Librum Psalmorum- 1557
Printer ; Louis Cruse
Printer ;Jacques Vivian 1513- Heitz Vol. 7 page 49
Printer; Wygand, Koln 1521-Heita vol. 7 page 37
Printer; William Caxton; Guido de Monte Rocherii, Manipulis Curatorum -1502[April 22] W. de Worde A second photo duplicating the above from Printer's &.Publisher's Devices by Ronald McKerrow, 1913
Printer; Julian Notary; Statutes 7 Henry V11 etc. [End of 12 & 19 Henry V11-Printer's & Publisher's Devices, Ronald Mckerrow, 1913
Printer; Petrus Treveris -The Noble Experience of the Vertuous Handy Work of Surgery; Braunschweig, H. -Southwark 1525
Printer; Richard Grafton-Primer, R. Grafton-Printer's &.Publisher's Devicesj , Ronald Mckerrow 1913
Printer; John Day-Fox J. Acts and Monuments 1563-Mckerrow
